list.abs: 希高翻译-石油化工词汇中英对照C二 ... catastrophic creep 频变蠕变 catastrophic failure 严重故障 catastrophic 灾难性的.
2001年7月23日 - 认知因素的引入使唤醒模型在多维量系统的道路上前进了一大步,哈笛与法基提出的激变模型(catastrophe model)[14]就是这一进步的标志之一,代表着新的.
什么是突变理论(Catastrophe Theory)? 释义突变理论是用形象的数学模型来描述连续性行动突然中断导致质变的过程, 这一理论与混沌理论(Chaos Theory)相关, 尽管它们.
突变论(Catastrophe Theory) 突变论是研究客观世界非连续性突然变化现象的一门新兴学科,自本世纪 70 年代创立以来,十数年间获得迅速发展和广泛应用,引起了科学界的.
巨灾债券(Catastrophe Bond)是伴随全球巨灾事件的频发而产生的一种新型的金融工具,即买卖双方通过资本市场债券发行的方式,投资 …

entry.tran: 灾难性的;引起重大灾难的
entry.def: Something that is catastrophic involves or causes a sudden terrible disaster.

example.ex: A tidal wave caused by the earthquake hit the coast causing catastrophic damage...
example.tran: 地震引起的海啸袭击了沿海地区，导致灾难性的破坏。

example.ex: The water shortage in this country is potentially catastrophic...
example.tran: 这个国家的水资源匮乏可能会带来灾难性的后果。

entry.def: If you describe something as catastrophic, you mean that it is very bad or unsuccessful.

example.ex: ...another catastrophic attempt to arrest control from a rival Christian militia...
example.tran: 为从敌对的基督教民兵组织手中夺得控制权而遭遇的再次惨败

example.ex: His mother's untimely death had a catastrophic effect on him.
example.tran: 他妈妈的过早离世对他具有灾难性的影响。

means.word_mean: 1. extremely harmful; bringing physical or financial ruin;

auth_sentence.content: The change could have catastrophic consequences for marine life.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The change could have catastrophic consequences for marine life.

auth_sentence.content: Escaping gas can also spark catastrophic explosions and fires.
auth_sentence.res_content: Escaping gas can also spark catastrophic explosions and fires.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Escaping gas can also spark catastrophic explosions and fires.

Sentence.sentence: Many experts now believe that given the right policies, the effects, though grave, need not be catastrophic.

sentences.cn: 可能对环境造成灾难性后果

sentences.en: It has been predicted that the Earth will tilt on its axis,causing catastrophic famine and disease.
sentences.cn: 有人曾预言地球会导致大荒灾和疾病。
